mapper.insert: insert into members( member_seq, id, password, name, gender, email, phone_number, postNumber, newAddress, city, county, village, indate ) values ( member_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{phone_number}, #{postNumber}, #{newAddress}, #{city}, #{county}, #{village}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select household_seq , member_seq , product , price , get_date , content , indate , ldate , inuser , luser from HouseHolds where member_seq=#{member_seq}
select member_seq, id, password, name, gender, email, phone_number, postNumber, newAddress, city, county, village, indate from members where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
select sum(price) from households where member_seq=#{member_seq}
select product, price, get_date, content from HouseHolds where get_date between sysdate-30 and sysdate order by get_date desc
select product, price, get_date, content from HouseHolds where get_date between sysdate-90 and sysdate order by get_date desc
select product, price, get_date, content from HouseHolds where get_date between sysdate-120 and sysdate order by get_date desc
select product, price, get_date, content from HouseHolds where get_date between sysdate-365 and sysdate order by get_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into Schedule ( schedule_seq ,member_seq ,data_type ,from_date ,content ,indate ,inuser ) values ( schedule_seq.nextval ,#{member_seq} , #{data_type} , to_date(#{from_date},'YYYYMMDD') , #{content} , sysdate , #{inuser} )

insert into Schedule ( schedule_seq ,member_seq ,data_type ,from_date ,to_date ,content ,indate ,inuser ) values ( schedule_seq.nextval ,#{member_seq} , #{data_type} , to_date(#{from_date},'YYYYMMDD') ,to_date(#{to_date},'YYYYMMDD') , #{content} , sysdate , #{inuser} )
mapper.select: select schedule_seq from schedule where member_seq=#{member_seq} and data_type= #{data_type} and from_date=to_date(#{from_date},'YYYYMMDD') and to_date=to_date(#{to_date},'YYYYMMDD') and content=#{content} and inuser=#{inuser}
mapper.insert: insert into Schedule ( schedule_seq ,member_seq ,data_type ,from_date ,time ,content ,indate ,inuser ) values ( schedule_seq.nextval ,#{member_seq} , #{data_type} , to_date(#{from_date},'YYYYMMDD') , #{time} , #{content} , sysdate , #{inuser} )
mapper.select: select schedule_seq ,member_seq ,data_type ,to_char(from_date,'YYYYMMDD') from_date ,to_char(to_date,'YYYYMMDD') to_date ,time ,content ,indate ,ldate ,inuser ,luser from Schedule where member_seq=#{member_seq}

select schedule_seq ,member_seq ,data_type ,to_char(from_date,'YYYYMMDD') from_date from_date ,to_char(to_date,'YYYYMMDD') to_date to_date ,time ,content ,indate ,ldate ,inuser ,luser from Schedule where from_date=#{from_date} OR (#{from_date} between from_date and to_date)
